hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Nodes_Count
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of nodes the new cluster will consist of

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: slave_spot_instance
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: instance life cycle for EMR slaves

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: slave_instance_spot_pct_price
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The percentage of EC2 instance price which will be used for Spot price. If spot instances is disabled, the value of this parameter can be anything.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Master_node_size
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Memory optimized: S: r3.xlarge Memory optimized: M: r3.4xlarge Memory optimized: L: r3.8xlarge GPU optimized: M: g2.2xlarge Compute optimized: S: c4.large Compute optimized: M: c4.2xlarge Compute optimized: L: c4.8xlarge

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Slave_node_size
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Memory optimized: S: r3.xlarge Memory optimized: M: r3.4xlarge Memory optimized: L: r3.8xlarge GPU optimized: M: g2.2xlarge Compute optimized: S: c4.large Compute optimized: M: c4.2xlarge Compute optimized: L: c4.8xlarge

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Timeout
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Timeout for EMR during build. Not mandatory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: aws_notebook_vpc_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Notebook VPC ID (secondary or the same VPC ID for deploy)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; sed 's/RID/'${rand}'/g' /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/create_dataengine-service/template_prepare.json | \ sed 's/SPI/'${slave_spot_instance}'/g' | \ sed 's/SISPP/'${slave_instance_spot_pct_price}'/g' | \ sed 's/EUN/'${User_name}'/g' | sed 's/ESR/'${Service_role}'/g' | \ sed 's/EE2R/'${EMR_EC2_role}'/g' | sed 's/EVER/'${Release_label}'/g' | \ sed 's/EMIT/'${Master_node_size}'/g' | sed 's/ESMT/'${Slave_node_size}'/g' | \ sed 's/EIC/'${Nodes_Count}'/g' | sed 's/ETIM/'${Timeout}'/g' | \ sed 's/NNM/'${Notebook_name}'/g' | sed 's/NVPCID/'${aws_notebook_vpc_id}'/g' | \ sed 's/EXN/'${exploratory_name}'/g' | sed 's/CON/'${computational_name}'/g' | \ sudo docker run -i -e "conf_tag_resource_id=user:tag" -e "configurations=$configurations" \ -v /home/dlab-user/keys:/root/keys -v /opt/dlab/tmp/result:/response \ -v /var/opt/dlab/log/dataengine-service:/logs/dataengine-service \ docker.dlab-dataengine-service --action create;
rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; sed 's/RID/'${rand}'/g' /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/create_dataengine-service/template_configure.json | \ sed 's/EUN/'${User_name}'/g' | sed 's/EVER/'${Release_label}'/g' | \ sed 's/APP/'${notebook_app}'/g' | sed 's/NNM/'${Notebook_name}'/g' | \ sudo docker run -i -e "conf_tag_resource_id=user:tag" \ -v /home/dlab-user/keys:/root/keys -v /opt/dlab/tmp/result:/response \ -v /var/opt/dlab/log/dataengine-service:/logs/dataengine-service \ docker.dlab-${notebook_app} --action configure;
